a1: The tool supports MP3, WAV, OGG, FLAC, AAC, and any audio format your browser can decode. The output is saved as a high-quality WAV file.
a2: Yes, use the Preview button to listen to the selected portion before cutting. Adjust the start and end points using the sliders or by typing exact times.
q3: Why is the output in WAV format?
a3: WAV is a lossless uncompressed format that preserves full audio quality. It ensures no quality loss during the cutting process and is compatible with all audio players.
